titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to encourage the use of zero-emission vehicles and technology at public-use airports, and for other purposes.
Generating Revenue for Electric and Emission-Negligible Vehicles at Airports Act
Generating Revenue for Electric and Emission-Negligible Vehicles at Airports Act
GREEN Vehicles at Airports Act
GREEN Vehicles at Airports Act
GREEN Vehicles at Airports Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles
